Description: Up For Auction Welcome and thank you for visiting our auction! In this auction we have a Kramer Pacer Classic Solid Body Electric Guitar - Desert Yellow. The instrument is well used in rough condition with cosmetic wear and tear from previous use. The body is covered with signatures and other markings. Two of the switch knobs are missing, some of the screws have rust. There are scuffs and nicks along the edges(see pic # 6& 7). Please see photos for more details and condition. Get this item now for an awesome price here at houstonbayou! Only pictured items are included in the auction. Please examine photos before bidding, I put magnified photos on here so that you can see every detail. If you do not see something in the photos or detailed in the description as being included, do not assume it is included. Happy Bidding! :) Buyer Info: Thank you for paying for auctions as soon as possible as Ebay will open an unpaid item dispute after 2 days of not receiving payment. If for any reason you cannot leave us a 5 star rating, contact us with any issues before opening a case with eBay. We will be happy to work with you to come to a satisfactory resolution. Questions: Monday to Friday 8:30 A.M. to 4:30 P.M. CST If you are inquiring on a weekend or after hours please at least allow us until the following business day to respond to your message. Please use eBay's message system. Refunds & Returns: We try as hard as we possibly can to make our customers happy. If you are not satisfied with your purchase please send me an email and I will do everything I can to make things right for you. Just drop me an email, you will find me more than willing to work with you in every way to make you a satisfied customer.Payment Terms Texas residents will pay sales tax of 8.25%. Shipping Terms Sorry -- No international shipping! This includes Canada We will only ship to confirmed PayPal addresses. inkfrog terapeak
